mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS1, ROLE, DONG, ADDRESS2, ZIP_CODE) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address1}, #{role, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dong}, #{address2}, #{zip_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, NAME = #{name}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ROLE = #{role}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, DONG = #{dong}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, ZIP_CODE = #{zip_code} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE LOWER(EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email}) AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM MEMBER WHERE UPPER(TRIM(EMAIL)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{email}))
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM MEMBER WHERE UPPER(TRIM(NICKNAME)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{nickname}))
SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
